pages.text: The $(item)thatch bed$() is the stone age version of the vanilla bed. To make it, place two $(l:getting_started/basic_materials)thatch blocks$() on the ground next to each other. Then, stand on the end facing the two thatch blocks, and $(4)right-click$() with a $(item)Large Raw Hide$(). You can only get Large hides from cows and bears.
The thatch bed can save your spawn, but you won't be able to skip the night..
pages.name: Thatch Bed
